Description:
Hey there! We are Apt Resources, a highly renowned company in the recruitment industry, and we are currently looking for a Light Vehicle Driver to join the team of one our clients a Royal Family in Abu Dhabi As a successful candidate, you will be responsible for providing friendly and professional customer service, ensuring the safe and timely transportation of their guests, and maintaining their vehicles. We offer a supportive, fun, and energetic work environment, so if you're passionate about driving and customer service, we would love to hear from you!Transport guests to and from their destinations in a courteous and safe manner
Maintain a clean and well-conditioned vehicle at all times, inside and out
Assist guests with their belongings as needed
Follow traffic laws and safety precautions at all times
Respond promptly to guest requests and inquiries
Communicate effectively with other team members and management
Handle cash and credit transactions accurately and efficientlyJob Details
